item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Saturday’s Powerball
item.description: The winning numbers in Saturday evening’s drawing of the "Powerball" game were: 07-14-23-24-60, Powerball: 14

item.title: Loved ones of paddleboarder killed in Maine to hold a celebration of life
item.description: Friends and family of a Maine woman whose killing on a rural pond shocked the community plan to celebrate her life with a maritime service

item.title: Russia and Ukraine hold fast to their demands ahead of a planned Putin-Trump summit
item.description: The threats, pressure and ultimatums have come and gone, but Russian President Vladimir Putin has maintained Moscow’s uncompromising demands in Ukrain...

item.title: Storms kill 1, injure another and displace hundreds of inmates in Nebraska
item.description: Strong storms in eastern Nebraska have left one person dead and seriously injured another

item.title: Iowa man dies after shooting 2 neighbors and setting his house on fire, officials say
item.description: Authorities in Iowa say a 71-year-old man has died after fatally shooting his two neighbors and setting his house on fire
